Different Crime.Crime Name: Facilitating or aiding the entry of an improperly documented individual into Canada contrary to s. 117 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
legal_basis: s. 10(2)(b) of the Canadian Passport Order
misrepresentation_or_fraud: Ryan helped his sister enter Canada with a fake passport, knowing it was counterfeit
decision_outcome: The application for judicial review was dismissed; Ryan's passport revocation stands
criminality_inadmissibility: This act meets the elements of s. 117 of the IRPA
